talked.text: Do you want to talk about anything else?

choices2.text: (Tell about the picture on the board)

school.text: Almost everyone have ignored me. They barely talked to me.
It's like everyone was avoiding me or giving me the silent treatment.

board.text: They decided to post pictures of me in every school board.
I don't know what I've done wrong to be treated like this.

momBoard.text: I'll speak with your father later about it.
Perhaps we should go and talk to your tutor and see what's going on.

choices3.text: I'm going to my room. I have stuff to do.

guille.text: Guille told me that Alex hates me.
Alex is making my life miserable.
And he's threatening half of the class to ignore me.

aboutBoard.text: And he told me that Anna is the first one following his game.
She arrived the first this morning...
And decided to post pictures of me all over the school boards.
